summary: This bill, the Multiple Firearm Sales Reporting Modernization Act of 2025, aims to expand the existing requirement for federal firearms licensees to report multiple handgun sales to include all types of firearms. Specifically, it amends Title 18 of the United States Code to mandate reporting of sales of two or more firearms to the same unlicensed individual within five consecutive business days. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on June 30, 2025.
